articles.author: RAJESH KUMAR SINGH
articles.title: Families in India cremate loved ones killed in stampede at religious festival - The Associated Press
articles.description: Grieving families in India are cremating their loved ones while others are caring for their injured relatives in hospitals a day after a stampede. At least 30 people were killed and 60 others injured on a riverbank at the Maha Kumbh festival in northern India…
articles.content: PRAYAGRAJ, India (AP) Grieving families cremated their loved ones while others cared for their injured relatives in hospitals on Thursday, a day after a stampede killed at least 30 people and injured… [+1713 chars]
